video:video.video:title: GoingNative 19: PdbProject - IntelliSense for Your C++ Executable
video:video.video:description: PDB Project is a Visual Studio extension that will allow Visual Studio 2012 to open and convert pdb into a vcxproj. The converted project will load as a normal VC project and provide IDE features&#8230;

video:video.video:title: GoingNative 18: Inside Vector Calling Convention (VCC)

video:video.video:title: GoingNative 17: Meet James McNellis, Register for GoingNative 2013
video:video.video:description: In this episode, Ale and Charles swap roles: Ale takes a camera into a dev's office and geeks out. Charles appears in the ctor and dtor segments with a singular message: register now for GoingNative&#8230;

video:video.video:title: GoingNative 16: Garrett Serack - Inside NuGet for C++
video:video.video:description: NuGet support for C&#43;&#43; projects in Visual Studio has arrived in NuGet version 2.5! This has been an elusive feature for VC&#43;&#43; developers so we are thrilled it's here. It's been around&#8230;

video:video.video:title: GoingNative 15: VC++ turns 20, Ale turns 40, C9 turns 9

video:video.video:title: GoingNative 12: C++ at Build 2012, Inside Profile Guided Optimization
video:video.video:description: Profile Guided Optimization, or PGO, is an approach to optimization where the compiler uses profile information to make better optimization decisions for the program. Profiling is the process of&#8230;

video:video.video:description: Fresh Paint is an excellent Windows Store App (for Windows 8). It's fun to use, realistic and beautiful ( yes, we really like this app ). In this episode we will meet the developers behind Fresh&#8230;

video:video.video:title: GoingNative 1: VC++ vNext, CRT, C++ and Beyond
video:video.video:description: We're back with the second installment of C9::GoingNative and we have a great show for you! Thanks for being patient and for all the excellent feedback and support for GN! We are listening to you and&#8230;

video:video.video:title: GoingNative 0: Help us fly this plane, Some modern C++, Meet Ale Contenti
video:video.video:description: Welcome to GoingNative! GoingNative is a new show on C9 dedicated to native development and native developers, with an emphasis on modern C&#43;&#43;. In our inaugural episode, we keep things light&#8230;
